content: from left needle then p1 k1tbl from cn gauge 8 stitches and 11 row = 1 inch / 2 5 cm in stockinette mountain ash socks v1 0 - shuyi wu - 2 clue 1 we will start off with the cuff and part of the leg using a stretchy cast-on of your choice cast on 64 72 sts join for working in the round the first 35 39 sts will form the instep and the last 29 33 sts will form the back of the leg use markers or needle boundaries to divide the stitches accordingly follow chart 1a over the 35 39 instep sts and chart 1b over the 29 33 back of leg sts note that the blue outlined sts are for size m only work row 1-4 a total of 4 times or 16 rounds and then proceed to the rest of the chart after row 8 continue to work the back of leg as established knit the knits purl the purls and continue the pkyok columns chart 1a is on the next page chart 1b is below mountain ash socks v1 0 - shuyi wu - 3 mountain ash socks v1 0 - shuyi wu - 4 clue 2 this week we will finish the leg and knit the heel follow chart 2a on the instep and continue to work the back of leg as established when you get to the end of chart 2a turn we will now work the heel flap over the 29 33 back of leg sts following chart 2b starting with a ws row for those who find flat charts confusing i have included written instructions for chart 2b work chart 2b a total of 9 10 times or 36 40 row or until desired length work the heel turn over the 29 33 heel flap sts as follows row 1 ws k3 p3 k2 p8 10 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 k4 ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 p until 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl1 k until 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 3-4 until all stitches have been consumed do not turn after the final rs row 17 19 sts remain chart 2a is on the next page chart 2b is below written instructions for chart 2b row 1 ws k3 p3 k2 p13 17 k2 p3 k3 row 2 rs k1 p2 pkyok p2 *sl1 k1 * repeat * to * 5 7 more times sl1 p2 pkyok p2 k1 row 3 ws repeat row 1 row 4 rs k1 p2 k3 p2 *sl1 k1 * repeat * to * 5 7 more times sl1 p2 k3 p2 k1 mountain ash socks v1 0 - shuyi wu - 5 mountain ash socks v1 0 - shuyi wu - 6 clue 3 it s time for the gusset be careful it might not be where you think it is round 1 with rs facing pick up
